1.title: Prom Date Dance Off
1.plot: Prom is around the corner and Harper is in search of the perfect Prom date. Will it be Farcus the intellectual, Caleb the ladies man, or Ace the undercover heart throb? Our head cheerleader Harper has a tough decision ahead of her, and these boys are battling it out. This fun video and catchy pop song for kids will have you singing and dancing along in no time. Who's going to be Harper's arm candy? "Prom Date Dance Off" has 3.5 million views and counting on Totally TV's YouTube channel.

2.title: Homework's the Worst
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: School's Out for Summer!
3.plot: The students at Pop Music High are ready for school to end and summer to begin. They're celebrating the end of the school year with a fun pop song for kids that's all about summer. "School's Out for Summer" is chalk-full of singing, dancing, a crazy teacher, and even mermaids. We guarantee School's Out will be one of your favorite summer songs. If you Like summer come join the celebration at Pop Music High. "School's Out for Summer" has 2.5 million views and counting on Totally TV's YouTube channel.

4.title: Boys vs. Girls
4.plot: Get ready for an epic battle of the sexes as the students from Pop Music High compete to see who's better, girls vs boys. Camp Hockaloogee is full of fun games, music for kids, and lots of friendly competition. "Boys vs Girls" is the perfect summer song that will have you singing and dancing along in no time. Who do you think will win? "Boys vs. Girls" has 1 million views and counting on Totally TV's YouTube channel.

5.title: We're Back
5.plot: School is officially back in session and the students at Pop Music High are eager to share all that happened over summer and rule the school as upperclassmen. Singing and dancing on the bleachers and football field to taking over the hallways and the classroom, this is an episode you don't want to miss. The students play some funny pranks on the new freshman and crazy old teacher.

6.title: Bad Cafeteria Food
6.plot: Now that school's back in session the students at Pop Music High have to deal with their crazy lunch lady and her yucky school lunch food. This is their school song all about unusual lunch food. Join the silliness in this music 2017 video with music for kids like you.

7.title: Spooky Campfire Song
7.plot: It's almost Halloween and the students of Pop Music High take you back to Camp Hockaloogee as they remember some of their creepiest, Spooky stories for kids. Watch as these Spooky campfire stories come to life right before your eyes. There's a lot of screaming, jumping, and of course singing. This pop song will be one of your new favorite Halloween songs.

8.title: Halloween Medley
8.plot: The unsuspecting students of Pop Music High are invited to a party at a magical, haunted house. After a game of truth or dare, the students get spooked, running in separate directions. Each student is transformed into their biggest fear as they enter the doors of the haunted rooms. Will they make it out okay!? It's time to dance and sing with the monsters because we're bringing you an epic Halloween Medley featuring your favorite Halloween music. From "Thriller" and "Superstition" to "Put a Spell on You" and the "Monster Mash," this episode will be sure to entertain. ...

9.title: Cheerleaders vs. Mascots
9.plot: When the cheerleaders and mascots dig up the $1,000 scavenger hunt prize at the same time, they decide to battle it out to see what team will bring home the money. Will the Rebel cheerleaders succeed and get a chance to go to Nationals money? Or will the mascots defeat the pep squad and head to Mascot Mania? From cheering and dancing to stunts and tumbling tricks, you won't want to miss a second of "Cheerleaders vs. Mascots." So join us in singing your new favorite school song. Who do you think will win money?

imdb.title: Pop Music High
plot: Episode 1 of _Pop Music High_ (qv) "Prom Date Dance Off." Watch as Harper and her friends throw a dance off to help find the perfect date for prom. Farcus and Caleb compete and are defeated by an unexpected foe.
